actions: Cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
Cools the Blood, stops bleeding, clears Toxic Heat, astringes fluids and generates flesh.
With Huai Jiao, Fang Feng, Huang Bai and Zhi Ke, for bleeding hemorrhoids.
Tonifies, activates and harmonizes the Blood, moistens the Intestines, unblocks the bowels, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao, drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
Promotes the movement of Qi and reduces distention and pressure.

syndromes: Hemorrhoidal bleeding without pain, constipation or distention
